about_the_game:
14 tracks (55 minutes total run-time) from the FORM Original Soundtrack composed by Cory Hawthorne and an exclusive 73 page digital Art Book, showing the creative process in which the stand out visuals for the game were created.

Full game sold separately

Tracks included

1. Ruthenium (The Hub) – 5:57
2. Terbium – 6:29
3. Iridium – 6:17
4. Cobalt – 5:35
5. Rubidium (The Mural) – 2:49
6. The Lab Gets Weirder – 0:54
7. The Unknown Appears – 1:54
8. Form End Credits – 3:20
9. Day 1 – 3:52
10. The Black Room – 3:16
11. The Blue Room – 3:15
12. Day 1 Morning – 3:36
13. The Green Room – 4:12
14. The Red Room – 4:25
